name: vega-transforms

scripts.build: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-transforms.js -c -m -o build/vega-transforms.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-transforms.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-transforms.js build/vega-transforms.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-array:d3,vega-dataflow:vega,vega-statistics:vega,vega-util:vega -f umd -n vega.transforms -o build/vega-transforms.js -- index.js
